## Hotel reservations

```{r}
library(readr)
hotelreservations <- read_csv("datasets/hotelreservations_raw.csv")
x<- sample(1:nrow(hotelreservations), 10000)
hotelreservations = hotelreservations[x, ]
write_csv(hotelreservations, "datasets/hotelreservations.csv")
```
